channel.title: Black Widow Claw [ v1 + v2 ]
channel.description:
Hello, Once again i'v made another model just because , I also put it into a test server to see how it will look like in-game. And now the media:

item.title: Black Widow Claw [ v1 + v2 ]
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:10, topic:537334”]I’ve merged the topics as it is the same model, if you make updates please add them to the same post in the future.

The second version looks a lot better, it gives it more of a claw effect now that you’ve shaped it properly. However, there i still places you could work on to save poly. Also, i would try experimenting with the sharpness of the claw. Take a look at some more claw models, examine them a bit and from more then one angle just to understand the shape.
I know it sounds annoying but the only way to really hit a nail on the head is to know what it is and where to hit it, good luck with you next attempt and i’m still here if you need help or further questions. :)[/quote]

Alrighty , thanks alot

Read full topic

item.title: Black Widow Claw [ v1 + v2 ]
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I’ve merged the topics as it is the same model, if you make updates please add them to the same post in the future.

The second version looks a lot better, it gives it more of a claw effect now that you’ve shaped it properly. However, there i still places you could work on to save poly. Also, i would try experimenting with the sharpness of the claw. Take a look at some more claw models, examine them a bit and from more then one angle just to understand the shape.
I know it sounds annoying but the only way to really hit a nail on the head is to know what it is and where to hit it, good luck with you next attempt and i’m still here if you need help or further questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Widow Claw [ v1 + v2 ]
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

V2:

It was made from scratch but the same idea , I think it looks better but i will leave it for you to rate it. And tell me if there is anything i could do to improve any future models.
I also tried to put it in-game but right now i’m away from home and couldn’t get to my server files to see how they look in-game. I could download another server , but i’m too lazy to do so. :rolleyes:

Pictures:





Read full topic

I look forward to seeing an improved version, if you need any help just hit me up.

item.title: Black Widow Claw [ v1 + v2 ]
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

amy_webb:

An interesting design, however the execution of the idea can be improved. I noticed how you mirrored the design underneath the model, however if you’ve ever looked at claws they’re curved and spiked. I’d try applying this to the three spikes and making the rest either a guard or a bracer effect.

Thanks for the feedback , i will actually try yo improve it as soon as i get some free time

Read full topic

item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

An interesting design, however the execution of the idea can be improved. I noticed how you mirrored the design underneath the model, however if you’ve ever looked at claws they’re curved and spiked. I’d try applying this to the three spikes and making the rest either a guard or a bracer effect.
